apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the student emoji presents a young person with an eager expression, their features softly rounded and illuminated by realistic lighting, in a pleasant medium-light skin tone. Dressed in attire often associated with learning, the emoji embodies a spirit of curiosity and academic pursuit. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading adds a subtle depth and polish, making this emoji a versatile symbol for education, studying, or the pursuit of knowledge in any context.
